# Ignore build results
bin/
obj/
Debug/
Release/
x64/
x86/
[Aa]rtifacts/

# Visual Studio cache/options
.vs/
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.userprefs

# Autogenerated files
*.log
*.tlog
*.tmp
*.pdb
*.cache
*.dbmdl
*.bak

# NuGet
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
*.nuspec
*.psmdcp
*.xml
packages/

# Rider / JetBrains IDE
.idea/

# Other
*.swp
*.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# If you use local save files for the RPG, ignore them
SaveGame.xml
SaveGame.json
